item.title: Illegal migrants charged with rape, aggravated sodomy and kidnapping of woman in Kansas: ICE
item.description: Two illegal migrants were charged with kidnapping a woman in Oklahoma and repeatedly assaulting and raping her on the way to Kansas.

item.title: Trump admin bans federal work-study funds from supporting political activism on college campuses
item.description: The Trump administration has banned Biden-era guidance allowing Federal Work Study funds to pay students for political activities on college campuses.
